gobblin.metrics.reporter.util

Interface SchemaVersionWriter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FixedSchemaVersionWriter, NoopSchemaVersionWriter, SchemaRegistryVersionWriter

    public interface SchemaVersionWriter
    Writes schema information to an DataOutputStream.

    This class is used for prefixing serialized Avro GenericData.Record with schema information that may help downstream services to parse the record.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object readSchemaVersioningInformation(DataInputStream inputStream)
      Parse schema information from DataInputStream, and advance inputStream to the location where actual record starts.
      void writeSchemaVersioningInformation(Schema schema, DataOutputStream outputStream)
      Write schema information to DataOutputStream.

    • Method Detail

      • writeSchemaVersioningInformation

        void writeSchemaVersioningInformation(Schema schema,
                                      DataOutputStream outputStream)
                               throws IOException
        Write schema information to DataOutputStream.
        Parameters:
        schema - Avro Schema of the data that will be serialized into outputStream.
        outputStream - DataOutputStream where record will be serialized.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readSchemaVersioningInformation

        Object readSchemaVersioningInformation(DataInputStream inputStream)
                                throws IOException
        Parse schema information from DataInputStream, and advance inputStream to the location where actual record starts.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - DataInputStream containing schema information and serialized record.
        Returns:
        Schema information.
        Throws:
        IOException
